des: The best and most innovative solutions must align to the consumer and be intuitive for partners to use in order to deliver great experiences and drive the best outcomes. Service Now helps retailers achieve this at scale by focusing on the technology that drives unique, exceptional experiences. As part of this, Service Now enables retailers to create a more connected enterprise, with more efficient operations at every level of the business that takes the friction out of interactions across all touchpoints.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
